name: AsteroidSimulatorGame
description:
A choice-driven simulator game, choose one from 3 options to determine the fate of you, a new-born asteroid. Hope you like it!

Using Unity3d Engine.
draw & code by myself.
click sound is generated by sfxr.
BGM is Twinkle Star.

My name is Lighty, if you are interested in improving this game or adding more and more random events, please fork the subject from GitHub:https://github.com/BreakEnder233/AsteroidSimulatorGame.git
